00010 class svm_predict
00011 {
00012         private static double atof(System.String s)
00013         {
00014                 return System.Double.Parse(s);
00015         }
00016         
00017         private static int atoi(System.String s)
00018         {
00019                 return System.Int32.Parse(s);
00020         }
00021         
00022         private static void  predict(System.IO.StreamReader input, System.IO.BinaryWriter output, svm_model model, int predict_probability)
00023         {
00024                 int correct = 0;
00025                 int total = 0;
00026                 double error = 0;
00027                 double sumv = 0, sumy = 0, sumvv = 0, sumyy = 0, sumvy = 0;
00028                 
00029                 int svm_type = svm.svm_get_svm_type(model);
00030                 int nr_class = svm.svm_get_nr_class(model);
00031                 int[] labels = new int[nr_class];
00032                 double[] prob_estimates = null;
00033                 
00034                 if (predict_probability == 1)
00035                 {
00036                         if (svm_type == svm_parameter.EPSILON_SVR || svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVR)
00037                         {
00038                                 System.Console.Out.Write("Prob. model for test data: target value = predicted value + z,\nz: Laplace distribution e^(-|z|/sigma)/(2sigma),sigma=" + svm.svm_get_svr_probability(model) + "\n");
00039                         }
00040                         else
00041                         {
00042                                 svm.svm_get_labels(model, labels);
00043                                 prob_estimates = new double[nr_class];
00044                                 //UPGRADE_ISSUE: Method 'java.io.DataOutputStream.Write' was not converted. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1000_javaioDataOutputStreamWrite_javalangString"'
00045                                 output.Write("labels");
00046                                 for (int j = 0; j < nr_class; j++)
00047                                 {
00048                                         //UPGRADE_ISSUE: Method 'java.io.DataOutputStream.Write' was not converted. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1000_javaioDataOutputStreamWrite_javalangString"'
00049                                         output.Write(" " + labels[j]);
00050                                 }
00051                                 //UPGRADE_ISSUE: Method 'java.io.DataOutputStream.Write' was not converted. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1000_javaioDataOutputStreamWrite_javalangString"'
00052                                 output.Write("\n");
00053                         }
00054                 }
00055                 while (true)
00056                 {
00057                         System.String line = input.ReadLine();
00058                         if ((System.Object) line == null)
00059                                 break;
00060                         
00061                         SupportClass.Tokenizer st = new SupportClass.Tokenizer(line, " \t\n\r\f:");
00062                         
00063                         double target = atof(st.NextToken());
00064                         int m = st.Count / 2;
00065                         svm_node[] x = new svm_node[m];
00066                         for (int j = 0; j < m; j++)
00067                         {
00068                                 x[j] = new svm_node();
00069                                 x[j].index = atoi(st.NextToken());
00070                                 x[j].value_Renamed = atof(st.NextToken());
00071                         }
00072                         
00073                         double v;
00074                         if (predict_probability == 1 && (svm_type == svm_parameter.C_SVC || svm_type == svm_parameter.NU_SVC))
00075                         {
00076                                 v = svm.svm_predict_probability(model, x, prob_estimates);
00077                                 //UPGRADE_ISSUE: Method 'java.io.DataOutputStream.Write' was not converted. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1000_javaioDataOutputStreamWrite_javalangString"'
00078                                 output.Write(v + " ");
00079                                 for (int j = 0; j < nr_class; j++)
00080                                 {
00081                                         //UPGRADE_ISSUE: Method 'java.io.DataOutputStream.Write' was not converted. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1000_javaioDataOutputStreamWrite_javalangString"'
00082                                         output.Write(prob_estimates[j] + " ");
00083                                 }
00084                                 //UPGRADE_ISSUE: Method 'java.io.DataOutputStream.Write' was not converted. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1000_javaioDataOutputStreamWrite_javalangString"'
00085                                 output.Write("\n");
00086                         }
00087                         else
00088                         {
00089                                 v = svm.svm_predict(model, x);
00090                                 //UPGRADE_ISSUE: Method 'java.io.DataOutputStream.Write' was not converted. 'ms-help://MS.VSCC.2003/commoner/redir/redirect.htm?keyword="jlca1000_javaioDataOutputStreamWrite_javalangString"'
00091                                 output.Write(v + "\n");
00092                         }
00093                         
00094                         if (v == target)
00095                                 ++correct;
00096                         error += (v - target) * (v - target);
00097                         sumv += v;
00098                         sumy += target;
00099                         sumvv += v * v;
00100                         sumyy += target * target;
00101                         sumvy += v * target;
00102                         ++total;
00103                 }
00104                 System.Console.Out.Write("Accuracy = " + (double) correct / total * 100 + "% (" + correct + "/" + total + ") (classification)\n");
00105                 System.Console.Out.Write("Mean squared error = " + error / total + " (regression)\n");
00106                 System.Console.Out.Write("Squared correlation coefficient = " + ((total * sumvy - sumv * sumy) * (total * sumvy - sumv * sumy)) / ((total * sumvv - sumv * sumv) * (total * sumyy - sumy * sumy)) + " (regression)\n");
00107         }
00108         
00109         private static void  exit_with_help()
00110         {
00111                 System.Console.Error.Write("usage: svm_predict [options] test_file model_file output_file\n" + "options:\n" + "-b probability_estimates: whether to predict probability estimates, 0 or 1 (default 0); one-class SVM not supported yet\n");
00112                 System.Environment.Exit(1);
00113         }
